strikeout_item_lines.description: Item line text to be struck out
choices: decanter of endless water (level 7, 320 gp) anointed waterskin (level 9, 600 gp; Pathfinder Secrets of Magic 179) candle of revealing (level 7, 60 gp; Pathfinder Advanced Player’s Guide 257) dust of disappearance (level 9, 135 gp) thawing candle (level 8, 90 gp; Pathfinder Rage of Elements 125) lover’s gloves (level 8, 500 gp; Pathfinder Advanced Player’s Guide 261) ring of lies (level 10, 850 gp) potion of fire resistance (lesser) (level 6, 45 gp) potion of fire resistance (moderate) (level 10, 180 gp)

summary_checkbox.description: Checkboxes in the adventure summary that should be selected
choices: disabled a steam trap to get to the underground entrance to the manor
